name: Ext_R4_Consent_source
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Consent.source[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Consent.source[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Consent|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Source from which this consent is taken
element.definition: The source on which this consent statement is based. The source might be a scanned original paper form, or a reference to a consent that links back to such a source, a reference to a document repository (e.g. XDS) that stores the original consent document.
element.comment: `Consent.source[x]` maps to R5 `Consent.sourceAttachment`. To multiple elements in Consent: (`Consent.sourceAttachment`, `Consent.sourceReference`). Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Consent)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Contract)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/QuestionnaireResponse)` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Consent.source[x]` maps to R5 `Consent.sourceReference`. To multiple elements in Consent: (`Consent.sourceAttachment`, `Consent.sourceReference`). Type `Attachment` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
